#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int dp[1000][1000];


int LCS(string s1, string s2) {
	int m, n, i, j;
	m = s1.length();
	n = s2.length();

	for(i = 0; i <= m; i++) {
		for(j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
			if (i == 0) {
				dp[i][j] = 0;
			} else if (j == 0) {
				dp[i][j] = 0;
			} else if (s1[i-1] == s2[j-1]) {
				dp[i][j] = 1 + dp[i-1][j-1];
			} else {
				dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1]);
			}
		}
	}

	return dp[m][n];
}

int main() {
	string s1, s2;
	cin>>s1>>s2;
	cout<<LCS(s1, s2)<<endl;
	return 0;
}
